MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:35am. Our engineers have arrived at the Breadalbane substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10am on Thursday, 18 February 2021
